list-item.p: We identified and cloned heat-responsive MAPK and MAPK-1 from wheat under HS.
Isolated recombinant MAPK protein of ∼40.3 kDa with high kinase activity under HS.
Native wheat MAPK showed maximum activity in thermotolerant cv. under HS.
MAPK showed positive correlation with tolerance, carbon flux and amylolytic linked traits.
MAPK was observed to stabilize the starch quality of the grains under HS.
